description: Restaurants, cafes and some pubs in the Republic of Ireland are opening after six weeks of lockdown.
title: Coronavirus: Irish shutdown eases with hospitality reopening
title_page: Coronavirus: Irish shutdown eases with hospitality reopening - BBC News
maintext: Speaking to BBC Radio Foyle, Mr McGlynn said he does not believe there will be an influx of people from Northern Ireland but said he would not be turning anyone away if they came from across the border.
